description: From a series of ten woodcuts for Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920; figure in center with arms raised up from their sides and rays of light coming from upper right corner; surrounding him in the lower third of the image are the heads of four figures looking up at the figure in the center of the image
portfolio: From Plate 10 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission), by Hermann Kasack, Rowohlt Verlag, Berlin 1920
title: For the Tenth Scene, Plate 10 from Die Tragische Sendung (The Tragic Commission)
